title: Practice-Centered Educational Intervention Strategy Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in educational program development and ability to analyze social contexts
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in designing customized educational interventions for practical application by professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can develop a draft of a customized educational module through at least five iterative design experiments.
Participants can derive educational intervention plans reflecting stakeholder needs by applying mutual acceptance strategies.
Teams can submit one applicable educational intervention for real-world job environments through their project outcomes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
